title: Pimento Tea Rooms
description: Typically a choice of 3 main courses, with at least one being vegan. Also a selection of toasts, salads, sandwiches, baked potatoes with many toppings, and cakes with at least 1 vegan cake. Large range quality teas and coffees; soya milk available. Try the vegan hot chocolate. Sits between The Wig and Mitre & Imperial Teas, near castle & cathedral, enter via Pimento dress shop.
